data.body: Listen for `onmousedown` event and when it happens store the event's `clientX` and `clientY` parameters. Then listen for `onmouseup` and if the new `clientX` and `clientY` values haven't changed then no dragging happened.

Thanks for the help Chandler, to be honest I've never used Closures, so did some reading up after you mentioned them and they seem so useful / powerful.

Cheers!
